Verses: 1 rooban Isravelukku Mudharpirandha Seshtapuththiran; Aanaalum Avan Than Thagappanudaiya Manjaththaith Theettuppaduththinapadiyinaal, Koththiraththu Attavanaiyile Avan Mudhar Pirandhavanaaga Ennappadaamal, Avanudaiya Seshtapuththira Sudhandharam Isravelin Kumaaranaagiya Yoseppin Kumaararukkuk Kodukkappattadhu.
2 yoodhaa Than Sagodhararile Balaththadhinaal Raajaadhipaththiyam Avan Sandhadhiyilundaanadhu; Aagilum Seshtapuththira Sudhandharam Yoseppudaiyadhaayitru.
3 isravelin Mudharperaana Roobanin Kumaaran Aanokku, Palloo, Esron, Karmee Enbavargal.
4 yovelin Kumaararil Oruvan Semaayaa; Ivan Kumaaran Kok; Ivan Kumaaran Simey.
5 ivan Kumaaran Meegaa; Ivan Kumaaran Raayaa; Ivan Kumaaran Paagaal.
6 ivan Kumaaran Peraa; Roobaniyarin Prabuvaana Ivanai Aseeriyaa Raajaavaagiya Thilkaadhpilnesar Siraipidiththupponaan.
7 thangal Sandhadhigalinpadiye Thangal Vamsa Attavanaigalil Ezhudhappatta Avan Sagodhararil Thalaivar Eyelum, Sagariyaavum,
8 yovelin Maganaagiya Semaavukkup Pirandha Aasaasin Kumaaran Pelaavum; Ivan Sandhadhiyaar Aaroverilum; Nepomattum, Paagaalmeyonmattum Vaasampanninaargal.
9 kizhakke Aipiraaththu Nadhithodangi Vanaandharaththin Ellaimattum Avargal Vaasampanninaargal; Avargal Aadumaadugal Keeleyaaththesaththil Migudhiyaayitru.
10 savulin Naatkalil Aagaariyarodu Avargal Yuththampanni, Thangal Kaiyaal Avargal Vizhundhapin, Avargal Koodaarangalile Keeleyaaththin Keezhppuramellaam Kudiyerinaargal.
11 kaaththin Puththirar Avargalukku Edhire Paasaandhesaththile Salkaamattum Vaasampanninaargal.
12 avargalil Yovel Thalaivanum, Saappaanum Avanukku Irandaavadhumaayirundhaan; Yaanaayum Saappaaththum Paasaanil Irundhaargal.
13 avargal Pidhaakkalin Veettaaraagiya Avargal Sagodharar, Migaavel, Mesullaam, Sebaa, Yoraayi, Yaakkaan, Seegaa, Eper Ennum Ezhuper.

14 ivargal Oorikkup Pirandha Abiyelin Kumaarar; Oori Enbavan Yerovaavukkum, Yerovaa Keeleyaaththukkum, Keeleyaadh Migaavelukkum, Migaavel Esisaayikkum, Esisaayi Yaadhovukkum, Yaadho Poosukkum Kumaararaayirundhavargal.
15 kooniyin Kumaaranaagiya Apthiyelin Magan Agi, Avargal Pidhaakkalin Veettuth Thalaivanaayirundhaan.
16 avargal Keeleyaaththilirukkira Paasaanilum, Adhin Velinilangalilum, Saaronin Ellaap Pettaigalilum Avaigalin Kadaiyaandharangalmattum Vaasampanninaargal.
17 ivargalellaarum Yoodhaavin Raajaavaagiya Yodhaamin Naatkalilum, Isravelin Raajaavaagiya Yerobeyaamin Naatkalilum Thangal Vamsaththu Attavanaippadi Thogai, Etrappattaargal.

18 rooban Puththirarilum, Kaaththiyarilum, Manaaseyin Paadhikkoththiraththaarilum Kedagamum Pattayamum Eduththu, Villeydhu, Yuththaththirkup Pazhagi, Padaikkup Pogaththakka, Sevagar Naarpaththu Naalaayiraththu Ezhunootru Arubadhuperaayirundhaargal.
19 avargal Aagaariyarodum, Yeththoor Naappees Nodhaab Enbavargalodum Yuththampannugirapodhu,

20 avargalode Edhirkkath Thunaipetrapadiyinaal, Aagaariyarum Ivargalodirukkira Yaavarum Avargal Kaiyil Oppukkodukkappattaargal; Avargal Yuththaththile Dhevanai Nokkik Kooppittu, Avarmel Nambikkai Vaiththapadiyinaal Avargal Vinnappaththaik Kettarulinaar.

21 avargal Ivargalukku Irundha Mirugajeevangalaagiya Aimbadhinaayiram Ottagangalaiyum, Irandulatchaththu Aimbadhinaayiram Aadugalaiyum, Irandaayiram Kazhudhaigalaiyum, Manusharil Latchampergalaiyum Pidiththaargal.
22 yuththam Dhevanaal Nadandhapadiyinaal Anegar Vettundu Vizhundhaargal; Thaangal Siraippattuppogumattum Ivargaludaiya Sthalaththile Kudiyirundhaargal.
23 manaaseyin Paadhikkoththiraththup Puththirarum Andha Dhesaththil Kudiyirundhu, Paasaanthodangip Paagaal Ermonmattum, Seneermattum, Ermon Parvadhamattum Perugiyirundhaargal.

24 avargal Thangal Pidhaakkalin Veettuth Thalaivaraagiya Epper, Ishi, Eliyel, Asriyel, Eremiyaa, Odhaaviyaa, Yaadhiyel Enbavargal Paraakkirama Veeraraana Manusharum Perpetra Thalaivarumaayirundhaargal.
25 avargal Thangal Pidhaakkalin Dhevanukku Dhrogampanni, Dhevan Avargalukku Munbaaga Azhiththirundha Dhesa Janangalin Dhevargalaip Pinpatri Soramponaargal.

26 aagaiyaal Isravelin Dhevan Aseeriyaa Raajaavaagiya Poolin Aaviyaiyum, Aseeriyaa Raajaavaagiya Thilkaadhpilnesarin Aaviyaiyum Ezhuppinadhinaale, Avan Roobaniyarum, Kaaththiyarum Manaaseyin Paadhikkoththiraththaarumaagiya Avargalai Siraipidiththu Innaalvaraikkum Irukkiradhupola, Aalaavukkum Aaborukkum Aaraavukkum Kosaan Aatrangaraikkum Konduponaan.
